title: Truth and Certainty Vocabulary
goal: Learn words for truth, certainty, and doubt.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Week 15 review:

past tense → ?
begin (contour) → ?
long duration → ?

(Answers: pu, co'a, ze'u)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
birti x1 is certain/sure that x2 is true certain
senpi x1 doubts/is skeptical of x2 doubt
jetnu x1 (proposition) is true true
jitfa x1 (proposition) is false false

Using Truth Words

ti jetnu

This is true.

ta jitfa

That is false.

Certainty and Doubt

mi birti lo du'u do klama

I am certain that you go.

mi senpi lo du'u ti xamgu

I doubt that this is good.

Note on lo du'u

lo du'u introduces a proposition (a statement that can be true or false):

lo du'u do klama = that you go (as a fact/proposition)

Key Point

jetnu and jitfa describe truth of propositions. birti and senpi describe your confidence.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Truth Values

Translate:

  1. This is true.
  2. That is false.
  3. The statement is true.
Answers
  1. ti jetnu
  2. ta jitfa
  3. lo jufra cu jetnu

Exercise 2: Certainty

Translate:

  1. I am certain.
  2. I am certain that you go.
  3. Bob is certain that this is good.
Answers
  1. mi birti
  2. mi birti lo du'u do klama
  3. la .bob. cu birti lo du'u ti xamgu

Exercise 3: Doubt

Translate:

  1. I doubt.
  2. I doubt that this is true.
  3. Alice doubts me.
Answers
  1. mi senpi
  2. mi senpi lo du'u ti jetnu
  3. la .alis. cu senpi mi

items.text: I am certain that you go.
Bob is certain that this is good.
items.answer: `la .bob. cu birti lo du'u ti xamgu`

items.text: I doubt that this is true.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "This is true." → ti jetnu
  2. "I am certain." → mi birti
  3. "I doubt that." → mi senpi ta

Summary

You learned four words for truth and certainty: birti (certain), senpi (doubt), jetnu (true), jitfa (false).
